name: Prince and Princess High School
description:
The Story of Daniel and his friends in a whole week of school!!

This is the story of Daniel a smart teen with his friends the goof
ball Victor and his not so bright but lovely friend Jane.
Daniel goes into to school to answer math problems, Take part
in sports or even spend a romantic time with Jane. Players get
to choose what happens to Daniel at certain points of the story.
You can have Daniel take a lunch break with Jane or Willow. Play
Hockey, Dodge Ball or Basketball with the sports fanatic Ace.
There is laughs, fun and excitement in this visual novel game.
